T02TD2588E:154a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i ratna no po ka /
T02TD2588E:154a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dbal rin po che'i cho ga / rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2588E:154a-4: bden pa dang ldan 'dzin bral ba //
T02TD2588E:154a-5: 'jam dpal yang dag kun mkhyen pa //
T02TD2588E:154a-6: de bzhin nyid kyi dang gnas pa //
T02TD2588E:154a-7: smra ba'i seng ge phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2588E:154a-8: de la gus pas 'dud pa yi //
T02TD2588E:154a-9: dus ni rtag tu bsgom pa dang //
T02TD2588E:154a-10: mos pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2588E:154a-11: de yi don du bshad par bya //
T02TD2588E:154a-12: stong pa la dga' dbang thob pa //
T02TD2588E:154a-13: dam tshig ldan zhing bsgom pa dga' //
T02TD2588E:154a-14: rnal 'byor srog gtong dad pa che //
T02TD2588E:154a-15: sems can don byed byas la drin //
T02TD2588E:154a-16: rtag tu mtshan brjod bzlas la brtson //
T02TD2588E:154a-17: de ltar yon tan bcu ldan pas //
T02TD2588E:154a-18: yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu //
T02TD2588E:154a-19: bde ba'i stan la gnas par bya //
T02TD2588E:154a-20: tha ma la yi dam dran pa la //
T02TD2588E:154a-21: snying gar yi ge mum ser dgod //
T02TD2588E:154a-23: phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras bla ma ni //
T02TD2588E:154a-24: spyan drangs mdun du bsams pa la //
T02TD2588E:154a-25: phyag 'tshal mchod pa sdig pa sbyang //
T02TD2588E:154a-26: yi rang skyabs 'go sems bskyed la //
T02TD2588E:154a-27: dge bsngo 'dud la sogs pas bstod //
T02TD2588E:154a-28: de nas stong nyid bsam pa ni //
T02TD2588E:154a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am a'adya nutpan na ta tv'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD2588E:154a-30: sngags don dngos po med pa la //
T02TD2588E:154a-31: yun rings dang la blo gnas pas //
T02TD2588E:154b-0: @154b de nyid la ni gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2588E:154b-1: de nas nam mkha' stong pa la //
T02TD2588E:154b-2: dngos po thams cad pam du gnas //
T02TD2588E:154b-3: de steng yi ge sam dkar las //
T02TD2588E:154b-4: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge gsal //
T02TD2588E:154b-5: de steng aa las zla bar gsal //
T02TD2588E:154b-6: gdan steng yi ge mum ser las //
T02TD2588E:154b-7: autpala sngon po mdzes par bsgom //
T02TD2588E:154b-9: smra ba'i seng ge bsgom par bya //
T02TD2588E:154b-10: ser po gser btso 'dra ba la //
T02TD2588E:154b-11: g-yas na autpala pu stis mtshan //
T02TD2588E:154b-12: g-yon pa gzhan la sbyin pa gtong //
T02TD2588E:154b-13: dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dzum dang ldan //
T02TD2588E:154b-14: thugs rje che bas nyon mongs spong //
T02TD2588E:154b-15: rin chen rnams kyis lus la brgyan //
T02TD2588E:154b-16: dbu la thor tshugs rnams kyis mdzes //
T02TD2588E:154b-17: dbu skra gtsug phud 'khyil pa dang //
T02TD2588E:154b-18: stod g-yogs ser po rnams kyis mdzes //
T02TD2588E:154b-19: smad g-yogs dar dpyangs dpyangs pa'o //
T02TD2588E:154b-20: rmugs pa'i rnam pa ma yin pas //
T02TD2588E:154b-21: gsal ba rtag tu bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2588E:154b-22: de nas spyan drangs mchod pa'o //
T02TD2588E:154b-23: aom w'a g'i shva ra dza: h'um bam ho: aom a'a: h'um gis mchod yon dbul /
T02TD2588E:154b-25: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a h'um:/
T02TD2588E:154b-26: aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'um /
T02TD2588E:154b-27: aom badzra nee bi hye a'a: h'um /
T02TD2588E:154b-29: kh'a gi kh'a hi a'a: h'um /
T02TD2588E:154b-30: mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-31: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-32: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-34: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-36: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-39: sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-40: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-42: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-44: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-45: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-47: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-48: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:154b-49: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2588E:155a-2: snying gar padma'i zla ba la //
T02TD2588E:155a-3: steng na ye shes sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2588E:155a-4: tshon gang dang 'dra gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD2588E:155a-5: yi ge aa mchog zla ba la //
T02TD2588E:155a-6: thugs kar bsam par bya ba yin //
T02TD2588E:155a-7: ye shes sngags phreng bskor bar bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-8: aom sarba dha rmm'a bh'a ba /
T02TD2588E:155a-11: aam aa: pra kri ti pa ri shuddha sarba dharmm'a ya du ta /
T02TD2588E:155a-12: sarba ta th'a ga t'a dzany'a na k'a ya manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a mu p'a ng'a ye ta /
T02TD2588E:155a-14: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hvi da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02TD2588E:155a-15: aom h'um h'im: bha ga w'ana dzany'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa /
T02TD2588E:155a-16: sarba dharmma ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmm'a dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: gsang bar phreng ba sngags la gtad //
T02TD2588E:155a-17: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-18: de nas mtshan rnams brjod pa la //
T02TD2588E:155a-19: ye shes sems dpa' dag la ni //
T02TD2588E:155a-20: dmigs pa brtan pa gtad nas su //
T02TD2588E:155a-21: yon tan dag tu brjod pa'o //
T02TD2588E:155a-22: de yang gal te ma brtan na //
T02TD2588E:155a-23: g-yeng bar gyur na nus pa chung //
T02TD2588E:155a-24: de la brtan par gyur pa na //
T02TD2588E:155a-25: ye shes gnyis med skye yang srid //
T02TD2588E:155a-26: yon tan dag tu brjod pa yang //
T02TD2588E:155a-27: theg pa mtha' chos ston mdzad pas //
T02TD2588E:155a-28: thams cad ngo bo yin shes las //
T02TD2588E:155a-29: thams cad de dang ldan par ston //
T02TD2588E:155a-30: de ltar byas shing bstod gyur na //
T02TD2588E:155a-31: chos sku mtha' dag thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2588E:155a-33: lha srin ste brgyad dga' 'gyur nas //
T02TD2588E:155a-36: skyo bar mi 'gyur gus par bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-37: skyo ba dag ni byung pa na //
T02TD2588E:155a-38: rnal 'byor gnyis su med par bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-39: aa las stong pa tsam par bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-40: gsal bar rtog med bsgom par bya //
T02TD2588E:155a-41: de nas aa ni zhu ba las //
T02TD2588E:155a-42: thig le dkar po je chung las //
T02TD2588E:155a-43: ye shes stong pa nyid gsal ba //
T02TD2588E:155a-44: bying rgod med par gsal ba'o //
T02TD2588E:155a-45: yang dang yang du gtad la bsgom //
T02TD2588E:155a-46: snang ba rang bzhin med mthong 'gyur //
T02TD2588E:155a-47: yang na shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02TD2588E:155a-48: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02TD2588E:155a-49: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02TD2588E:155a-50: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02TD2588E:155a-52: bcu drug phyed brgyad de phyed de //
T02TD2588E:155b-0: bzhi ni gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo @155b yi //
T02TD2588E:155b-1: lte pa shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02TD2588E:155b-2: bcu gnyis rtsibs can 'khor lo la //
T02TD2588E:155b-3: sngags kyi rnam par dgod pa ni //
T02TD2588E:155b-4: aa a'a aam a'a rim par dgod //
T02TD2588E:155b-5: de nas yang dang yang du dgod //
T02TD2588E:155b-6: dbus su aa mchog bsam par bya //
T02TD2588E:155b-8: snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2588E:155b-9: rtsibs bcu gnyis dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2588E:155b-15: aam aa: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis g-yas na bskor nas bkod par bya //
T02TD2588E:155b-16: lte ba la ni aa mchog gnas //
T02TD2588E:155b-17: mgrin par shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2588E:155b-18: bcu gnyis rtsi bas mchan gnas pa la //
T02TD2588E:155b-19: lte ba aa bsgom rtsibs rnams la //
T02TD2588E:155b-22: pradzny'a na mar rim pas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2588E:155b-23: de nas spyi bo'i 'khor lo la //
T02TD2588E:155b-24: bcu gnyis rtsi bas la dgod par bya ba ni //
T02TD2588E:155b-25: sku'i phreng sngags te las sngags so //
T02TD2588E:155b-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra aom h'um hr'i:/
T02TD2588E:155b-28: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'u rtti /
T02TD2588E:155b-29: w'a g'i shvar ra ma h'a w'a tsa /
T02TD2588E:155b-30: sarba dha rma ga ga na /
T02TD2588E:155b-31: aa ma la su pa ri shuddhu /
T02TD2588E:155b-32: dha rma dh'a tu dzany'a na garbha a'a: dbus su aa dkar chen po gnas //
T02TD2588E:155b-33: 'og nas ham dkar bzlog nas bsam //
T02TD2588E:155b-34: dbus na yi ge yod pa ste //
T02TD2588E:155b-35: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo de la bya //
T02TD2588E:155b-36: 'khor lo nang stong 'od ltar 'dug / yi ge rdul thig gang ltar bsam //
T02TD2588E:155b-37: dbus kyi thig le'i rang bzhin yin //
T02TD2588E:155b-38: dga' ba du ma yod pas lta //
T02TD2588E:155b-39: 'khor lo bzhi la shes rab ste //
T02TD2588E:155b-40: thig le aa wa dh'u t'i thabs //
T02TD2588E:155b-41: nor bu'i rtse nas h'um la thug / dkar bo 'od du 'dug pa'o ;
T02TD2588E:155b-42: ; de nas byang chub rgyu ba'o //
T02TD2588E:155b-43: nor gnas tsanda l'i gnas pas //
T02TD2588E:155b-44: de la gtad de bsam pa'o //
T02TD2588E:155b-45: 'khor lo de ltar gnas pa ni //
T02TD2588E:155b-46: yan lag bya ba de yin no //
T02TD2588E:155b-47: med pa rtsis las 'das pa ste //
T02TD2588E:155b-48: tshad med bsam gtan byed pa'o //
T02TD2588E:155b-49: de yang tsanta la'i la gtad pas so //
T02TD2588E:155b-50: me 'bar drong las brten nas byung //
T02TD2588E:155b-51: aa wa dh'u ti'a lam zhugs nas //
T02TD2588E:155b-52: lte bar me 'bar thams cad bsregs //
T02TD2588E:155b-53: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi ka yi //
T02TD2588E:155b-54: spyi bo'i bde ba ngang gis zhu //
T02TD2588E:155b-55: 'o ma ltar dkar thams cad gang //
T02TD2588E:155b-56: nor bu phebs nas lte gnas 'dren //
T02TD2588E:156a-2: de steng sa lus gso bde ba 'byung //
T02TD2588E:156a-3: snang ba dga' ba ba skye ba'o //
T02TD2588E:156a-4: bcu drug log po lta bu 'byung //
T02TD2588E:156a-5: tha mal zag med ye shes skye //
T02TD2588E:156a-7: spyi bor bsdu bar 'dod pa yi //
T02TD2588E:156a-8: dga' bral song yang nyes mi 'gyur //
T02TD2588E:156a-9: tha mal thabs las ma byung bas //
T02TD2588E:156a-11: de yang rlung gi brtan thob pa //
T02TD2588E:156a-12: bya ba rung gi gzhan nas min //
T02TD2588E:156a-13: tha mal zag med thob pa la //
T02TD2588E:156a-14: med pa'i tshig 'das de yin no //
T02TD2588E:156a-15: tha mal gshegs su gsol ba dang //
T02TD2588E:156a-16: lha yi nga rgyal gnas par bya //
T02TD2588E:156a-17: spyod pa dge ba gang mos bya //
T02TD2588E:156a-18: dad yod khro med sbyin par bya //
T02TD2588E:156a-19: lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun //
T02TD2588E:156a-20: bde ba che la ngang gnas bya //
T02TD2588E:156a-21: ma brjed pa yi bsam gtan bsten //
T02TD2588E:156a-22: de ltar byas na bla med 'gyur //
T02TD2588E:156a-25: bdag gis bsags pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2588E:156a-26: 'gal ba ma mchis lha la bshags //
T02TD2588E:156a-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba yid 'ong kun //
T02TD2588E:156a-28: thams cad 'jam dpal thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD2588E:156a-29: dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin mas mdzad pa //
T02TD2588E:156a-30: smri ti dzny'a na k'i rtis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
